description: Source files for the Plugin_AppGateway component within the app-gateway2 project, including implementation files for classes such as AppGateway, AppGatewayImplementation, AppGatewayResponderImplementation, Resolver, and Module. These files are part of the build process and contain class definitions, function implementations, and external references.

classes.name: AppGateway
classes.description: Main class responsible for handling gateway functionalities.

classes.name: AppGatewayResponderImplementation
classes.description: Responder class for gateway requests, handling responses.

classes.name: Resolver
classes.description: Class responsible for resolving dependencies or configurations.

classes.name: Module
classes.description: Module class that initializes or manages parts of the plugin.

methods.name: Constructor and Destructor methods for each class
methods.description: Standard constructor and destructor implementations for the respective classes.

methods.name: External functions invoked within each cpp file
methods.description: Functions called for processing, communication, or configuration, specific to the plugin's logic.
